column4: Hi everyone. I'm trying to install Ubuntu 7.10 for the first time and I have a problem.  Twice now, the installer has frozen at 15% on "Installing System | Detecting file systems..."  I've waited like 20 minutes and nothing is happening and there is no response to the mouse or keyboard; the cursor doesn't even move. Any suggestions?
have you tried doing the memory check and "check cd for defects"?
if you get any errors that could be your problem
yes, my laptop hung in the installation and turned out the ram was faulty, just an idea
